title: Neapolitan baked Alaska
description: Three really is the magic number when it comes to ice cream and when it's finished with a prettily tinted meringue who can resist?Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 3 litre/5¼pint pudding bowl, a sugar thermometer, a piping bag fitted with a 2D star nozzle and a freestanding mixer with a whisk attachment.
